builds_by_build_id.map: function (doc) { if(doc.build_id) { emit (doc.build_id, { timestamp: doc.timestamp, udid: doc.udid, message: doc.message, owner: doc.owner, log: doc.log } ); } }

builds_by_owner.map: function (doc) { if(doc.owner) { emit ([doc.timestamp, doc.owner], { timestamp: doc.timestamp, udid: doc.udid, message: doc.message, log: doc.log } ); } }

updates.delete_expired: function (doc, req) { if (doc.date < req.query.mindate) { doc._deleted: true; return [doc, "deleted"] }}
